Hi, I am having the same issue. I tried to debug it and I found out that for some reason a triangle has been added that contains the same vertex twice. I can send you the input I am using. In which format do you want me to deliver it to you?

Use the Triangle file format (.node or .poly) and post the contents here (if it's small) or upload the data to pastebin or some online storage like dropbox.

wo80 helped me out and it turned out that my input polygon was incorrect. I added a contour twice to the polygon. (once as polygon and once as segments)

So Triangle.NET wasn't the issue for me.
